question: India has contributed USD 15.46 million to which international Partnership Fund?
explanation:
India has recently contributed a sum of USD 15.46 million to the India-UN Development Partnership Fund.
India's Permanent Representative to the UN Ambassador T S Tirumurti handed over it to the United Nations Office for South-South Cooperation (UNOSSC). This UN Office manages the India-UN Development Partnership Fund. In the 15 million fund, USD 6 million goes to the overall fund and the remaining to the Commonwealth countries.
